case_caption: United States of America v. Test Corporation LLC et al.
court: United States District Court, Middle District of Florida

claims.title: Fraud and False Statements - 26 USC 7206
claims.description: Defendants willfully made and subscribed returns containing false statements

claims.title: Tax Evasion - 26 USC 7201
claims.description: Defendants willfully attempted to evade taxes

claims.title: Injunction - 26 USC 7402
claims.description: Permanent injunction against further tax violations

factual_allegations.allegation: Defendants maintained two sets of books
Defendants diverted corporate funds for personal use
Defendants failed to report income from cash transactions

relief_sought: Judgment for unpaid taxes in the amount of $125,000
defense_strategy_notes: Challenge sufficiency of evidence for willfulness element
Assert reasonable reliance on professional advice
